sentences.sContent: ‘But why can’t I go?’ he said in a querulous voice.
sentences.sCn: “可是为什么我不能去呢？”他抱怨道。

synos.tran: 易怒的，暴躁的；爱发牢骚的，抱怨的；爱挑剔的

remMethod.val: 发着发着牢骚 (querulous) 就变成吵架 (quarrel) 了

trans.tranCn: 易怒的，暴躁的；爱发牢骚的，抱怨的；爱挑剔的
trans.tranOther: someone who is querulous complains about things in an annoying way
